description: Benoit Maria, who worked with indigenous groups, was killed in the north-west of the country.
title: French activist who worked with Guatemala indigenous people shot dead
title_page: French activist who worked with Guatemala indigenous people shot dead - BBC News
maintext: "He was murdered... while on his way to his workplace in indigenous communities. For more than 20 years [he] had been in charge of... defending the rights of peasants and indigenous communities."
